message:
Eurogamer perfectly encapsulates the paradox that is the Wii:

“The success story of this console generation has turned out to have the most boring ongoing narrative.”

And at the end there is really only one thing to blame - the fact that Nintendo opted for cartridge-based format and not disc back in the N64 days. That's when they lost third-party support forever. Obviously they tried to regain some of that in this generation but I kinda think that most developers entered the arena with relatively burnt fingers and jumped ship once they saw some fire in the horizon.
